TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/OrientationEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Fornece constantes para compatibilidade com a propriedade do Visual Basic 6.0.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No Visual Basic 6.0, o `Orientation` propriedade foi usada para especificar se um `ADODataControl` foi exibida com uma orientação horizontal ou vertical.In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Orientation` property was used to specify whether a `ADODataControl` was displayed with a horizontal or vertical orientation. > [!NOTE] > Funções e os objetos no namespace são fornecidos para uso pelas ferramentas para atualização do Visual Basic 6.0 para o [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. Na maioria dos casos, essas funções e objetos duplicam a funcionalidade que é possível encontrar em outros namespaces no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Eles só são necessários quando o modelo de código do Visual Basic 6.0 é muito diferente da implementação de [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/OrientationEnum adHorizontal = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/OrientationEnum adVertical = int32(1)
